DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomize , multicenter study evaluate participant preference subcutaneous ( SC ) versus intravenous ( IV ) trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) participants HER2-positive metastatic breast cancer respond first-line treatment IV trastuzumab least 3 year . Participants randomize receive either 3 cycle ( cycle length = 21 day ) trastuzumab SC follow 3 cycle trastuzumab IV 3 cycle trastuzumab IV follow 3 cycle trastuzumab SC . All participant receive trastuzumab SC Cycles 7 18 . Anticipated time study treatment 1 year disease progression inacceptable toxicity occur , whichever come first .
